title: Electrical
metaDescription: Need electrical work done? Homezy connects you with licensed electricians in the UAE for wiring, lighting, panel upgrades, and emergency repairs.
keywords: electrical services, electrician UAE, home wiring, light installation, electrical repair UAE
description: From routine electrical installations to urgent fault repairs, Homezy helps you find certified electricians who deliver safe, compliant, and efficient electrical solutions. Whether it's a residential, commercial, or industrial job, listed professionals are vetted to meet UAE regulations and safety standards.
benefits: Compliance with DEWA and ADDC standards
whatToExpect: Once you post your service request on Homezy, youâ€™ll receive quotes from experienced electricians. You can compare credentials, read reviews, and choose the right provider for tasks ranging from light fittings to full rewiring jobs.

faqs.question: Are emergency electrical repairs available?
faqs.answer: Yes, many professionals on Homezy offer 24/7 emergency electrical services across the UAE.

faqs.question: Do the listed electricians handle permit approvals?
faqs.answer: Some providers include permit handling in their services, especially for large installations. This can be confirmed during the quote stage.

schema.name: Electrical
schema.description: Homezy connects homeowners and businesses in the UAE with licensed electricians for installations, repairs, and inspections in compliance with safety standards.
